vulnerability_summary.title: Missing HSTS Header in https://example.com
vulnerability_summary.description: Vulnerable to SSL stripping and man-in-the-middle attacks

detailed_findings.attack_vector: Attacker can perform SSL stripping attacks to downgrade HTTPS to HTTP

reproduction_steps: 3. If missing, vulnerable to SSL stripping attacks

business_impact.technical_impact: Attackers can downgrade HTTPS to HTTP and intercept credentials

platform_reports.hackerone:
# Missing HSTS Header in https://example.com

## Vulnerability Type
Vulnerable to SSL stripping and man-in-the-middle attacks

## Severity
MEDIUM

## Affected URL
https://example.com

## CVSS Score
5.5 - CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N

## CWE ID
CWE-319

## OWASP Category
A02:2021 - Cryptographic Failures

## Detailed Description
No Strict-Transport-Security header configured

## Proof of Concept
1. 1. Test HTTPS availability: YES
2. 2. Check HSTS header: MISSING
3. 3. If missing, vulnerable to SSL stripping attacks
4. 4. Test HTTP connection downgrade
5. 5. Vulnerability confirmed: YES

## Business Impact
Credential theft, session hijacking, data interception

## Remediation
- Add Strict-Transport-Security header
- Set appropriate max-age (minimum 6 months)
- Consider includeSubDomains and preload

## Timeline
- **Discovery**: 2025-12-01T08:31:38.380314
- **Report**: 2025-12-01T08:31:43.034498
platform_reports.bugcrowd:
**Vulnerability Summary:**
Missing HSTS Header in https://example.com

**Description:**
Vulnerable to SSL stripping and man-in-the-middle attacks

**Severity:** MEDIUM
**CVSS:** 5.5

**Affected Endpoint:** https://example.com

**Steps to Reproduce:**
1. 1. Test HTTPS availability: YES
2. 2. Check HSTS header: MISSING
3. 3. If missing, vulnerable to SSL stripping attacks
4. 4. Test HTTP connection downgrade
5. 5. Vulnerability confirmed: YES

**Evidence:**
Validation confirmed through automated testing framework.

**Business Impact:**
Credential theft, session hijacking, data interception

**Recommendations:**
• Add Strict-Transport-Security header
• Set appropriate max-age (minimum 6 months)
• Consider includeSubDomains and preload
